mutants.original_line: sumo += arr[(i + M - 1) % N]  # Add the next element in the circular array
mutants.code:
def max_fruits(arr, N, M):
    sumo = sum(arr[:M])
    ans = sumo
    for i in range(1, N):
        sumo -= arr[(i + M - 1) % N]
        sumo -= arr[i - 1]
        ans = max(ans, sumo)
    return ans
